aws_s3_bucket_analysis_configuration.description: Provides a S3 bucket analytics configuration resource.

bucket.description: The name of the bucket this analytics configuration is associated with.

name.description: Unique identifier of the analytics configuration for the bucket.

filter.description: Object filtering that accepts a prefix, tags, or a logical AND of prefix and tags (documented below).

storage_class_analysis.description: Configuration for the analytics data export (documented below).

prefix.description: The prefix to append to exported analytics data.

tags.description: Set of object tags for filtering.

output_schema_version.description: The schema version of exported analytics data. Allowed values: `V_1`. Default value: `V_1`.

destination.description: Specifies the destination for the exported analytics data (documented below).

s3_bucket_destination.description: Analytics data export currently only supports an S3 bucket destination (documented below).

bucket_arn.description: The ARN of the destination bucket.

bucket_account_id.description: The account ID that owns the destination bucket.

format.description: The output format of exported analytics data. Allowed values: `CSV`. Default value: `CSV`.
